education.title: Education
education.description: Right now I'm studying to become a .NET Fullstack developer at Chas Academy in Stockholm and will complete my education next year. I have a High School diploma from Fredrika Bremer in Technology and Media Studies, as well as standalone courses in Web Development and Programming. I also have knowledge in many different warehouse systems such as Microsoft D365, Pyramid, SAP and others.

experience.role: C# Console app – group project with transactions, currencies, etc.
I have worked at diffrent logistic companies such as Din Bil, Alfa Laval, KH-Maskin and others and have experience in systems such as D365, Automaster And SAP
